patthana16.18:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.18:1.1_1: Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.18:1.1_2: Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.18:1.1_3: Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto ca naabyākato nacittasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.18:1.1_4: Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasampayutto ca naakusalo nacittasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.18:2.1_0: Akusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.18:3.1_0: Abyākataṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.18:3.1_1: Abyākataṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.18:3.1_2: Abyākataṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasampayutto ca naakusalo nacittasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.18:4.1_1: ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
